Name: Jonathan Hult
AboutMe:
Jonathan is an experienced IT consultant with 8+ years of experience. Jonathan has a deep understanding of the Oracle Fusion Middleware stack, hands on experience and years of industry experience in design, development, support of large scale projects.

Jonathan started his IT journey in his teens by fixing computers for family and friends. During high school, he served as Technical Director for a financial advisor's office. Jonathan continued his journey by attending Iowa State where he graduated in three years with a B.S. in MIS. After college, Jonathan started working with Oracle WebCenter Content.

Today, Jonathan works as a Solutions Consultant focusing on the Oracle Fusion Middleware stack including Java, WebLogic, WebCenter Content, WebCenter Portal, BPM and SOA. His primary goal is to help customers benefit from Oracle Fusion Middleware by providing pre-sales technical support, proof of concepts and estimating.

Jonathan is a globally recognized consultant within the Oracle WebCenter Content community. He has worked with clients around the world to help them evaluate software solutions to business problems. Jonathan has worked in a wide variety of sectors (Commercial and Public Sector), worked on big and small projects (ranging from small businesses to Fortune 100 companies and Government) and in varying capacities (ranging from developer to project lead).

Jonathan maintains a personal technical blog at https://jonathanhult.com as well as shares his expertise on the Mythics blog (http://www.mythics.com/blog/). He is very active on the OTN forums where he enjoys mentoring others. Jonathan regularly presents at Collaborate, Oracle Tech Days and other events.

Outside of his career, Jonathan enjoys disc golf, bowling, snow skiing, board and video games, watching movies/TV and rock music/concerts. He can play multiple instruments including piano, trumpet and guitar. He loves Jesus and worships, walks with, and works for Him at Harvest Bible Chapel Davenport.
